Message:
When I open my eyes,
I was on a bed.

Cerberus sees me wake up,
and hugs me with tears
running down her face.

She won’t stop apologizing,
so I gently stroked her small face.

I’m the one who’s sorry.
I came so late to save you.
I’m so glad that you’re safe.
And then we sat there for hours,

After all, we have tons of
catching up to do.
We need to make up for
all the time we spent apart.

Huh? You wanna hear
more about Master,
Cerberus?

We don’t have to rush,
you know.

I think I’ll talk about
the time I met Master.
